languages.text: Стоит присмотреться к вещам убитых анверов и поискать иные свидетельства. Учитывая, как дерзко себя ведут анверы, они рано или поздно выдадут себя.

It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.
languages.original_text: Стоит присмотреться к вещам убитых анверов и поискать иные свидетельства. Учитывая, как дерзко себя ведут анверы, они рано или поздно выдадут себя.

traits.locale_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

languages.text: 仔细检查那些遭到安维尔帮杀害的受害者，检查他们身上的物品，寻找其他证据。总有一天，那些人的暴行会让他们露出马脚。
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: 仔细检查那些遭到安维尔帮杀害的受害者，检查他们身上的物品，寻找其他证据。总有一天，那些人的暴行会让他们露出马脚。

languages.text: アンヴァースに殺された被害者の携行品を詳しく調べること、さらに他の証拠を探すことには意味がありそうだ。アンヴァースの厚かましい行動は、遅かれ早かれ自らの首を絞めることになるのは確実だ。
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: アンヴァースに殺された被害者の携行品を詳しく調べること、さらに他の証拠を探すことには意味がありそうだ。アンヴァースの厚かましい行動は、遅かれ早かれ自らの首を絞めることになるのは確実だ。

languages.text: Es buena idea examinar las pertenencias de las víctimas de los Anvers y buscar otras pruebas. Su descaro garantiza que cometerán un error tarde o temprano.
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: Es buena idea examinar las pertenencias de las víctimas de los Anvers y buscar otras pruebas. Su descaro garantiza que cometerán un error tarde o temprano.

languages.text: Es lohnt sich einen genaueren Blick auf die Habseligkeiten der Opfer Anvers zu werfen und nach weiteren Beweisen zu suchen. Durch ihr dreistes Vorgehen werden sich die Anvers früher oder später selbst verraten.
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: Es lohnt sich einen genaueren Blick auf die Habseligkeiten der Opfer Anvers zu werfen und nach weiteren Beweisen zu suchen. Durch ihr dreistes Vorgehen werden sich die Anvers früher oder später selbst verraten.

languages.text: Il serait judicieux d'examiner de plus près les affaires des victimes des Anver et de chercher d'autres preuves. Les actes irréfléchis des Anver laissent penser qu'ils finiront par se trahir un jour ou l'autre.
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: Il serait judicieux d'examiner de plus près les affaires des victimes des Anver et de chercher d'autres preuves. Les actes irréfléchis des Anver laissent penser qu'ils finiront par se trahir un jour ou l'autre.

languages.text: Anverların öldürdüğü kimselerin eşyalarına yakından incelemek ve başka deliller aramak faydalı olacaktır. Anverların arsızca eylemleri yüzünden er ya da geç kendilerini ele verecekleri belli.
languages.original_text: It is worth taking a closer look at the belongings of those killed by the Anvers and searching for other evidence. The Anvers' brazen actions guarantee that they will give themselves away sooner or later.

traits.locale_text: Anverlar tarafından öldürülenlerin eşyalarına yakından bakmaya ve başka deliller aramaya zaman ayırmaya değer. Anverların arsızca eylemleri, er ya da geç kendilerini ele vereceklerini garantiliyor.
